description: Translate .lu files from one language to another. Uses the Microsoft translator text API.

options.to_lang: Target language to translate to. See https://aka.ms/translate-langs for list of supported languages and codes. You can also specify comma or space delimited list of target languages.
options.translate_key: Your translation key. See https://aka.ms/translate-key to get your key
options.lu_folder: [Optional] Folder that has the .lu file. By default ludown will only look at the current folder. To look at all subfolders, include -s
options.out_folder: [Optional] Output folder for all files the tool will generate
options.src_lang: [Optional] Source language. When omitted, source language is automatically detected. See https://aka.ms/translate-langs for list of supported languages and codes
options.subfolder: [Optional] Include sub-folders as well when looking for .lu files
options.translate_link_text: [Optional] Translate URL or .lu file reference link text
options.batch_translate: [Optional] Batch up <x> (1-25) number of lines before calling translation API. Defaults to 25.
